scripts.say: The following day - Prior to Sardegna's plan
I wonder if all Royal aristocrats speak in such a peculiar manner...
Hah! You may not know the way of the Force, but nevertheless we shall fight side by side and fight our common enemy for this Operation! Let us search for the Heart of Dissonance!
Zara... I kind of get what she's trying to say, but what a strange person...
Yeah, I can manage. Maybe those Royal Navy folks are just wired differently. Let's just act like we totally understand so she won't laugh at us like we're country bumpkins.
Err, according to our intel, the next area we should search for the Heart of Dissonance lies 100 nautical miles southeast of here...

Ah, just what I would expect from a carabinieri â€“ that is, an Imperial Dragoon! Now, using my Thippus Field Manipulation, I can divine our distance from the enemy, but even pushing to level 6, I still can't feel them!
I'm level 10! Please allow me to search for them!
Ohh, incredible! You must feel the Force as well...!
Psst, Zara... Do you think Carabiniere can actually communicate with her?
Just pretend not to hear them...
